EmailTemplate.description: Initial application email to recruiter after preparing resume package
EmailTemplate.name: Initial Application Email
EmailTemplate.subject: Application for {!Opportunity.Name}
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Opportunity.Contact.FirstName},
I hope this message finds you well. I am writing to express my strong interest in the {!Opportunity.Name} position.
With my background in Salesforce and proven track record of success, I believe I would be an excellent fit for this role. I have attached my resume and cover letter for your review.
I would welcome the opportunity to discuss how my experience and skills align with your team's needs. Please let me know if you need any additional information.
I look forward to hearing from you.
Best regards, Abby Luggery {!User.Email} {!User.Phone}
